name: All Valley Karate Championship
overview: After suffering bullying at his high school, Daniel receives karate classes. Once you have learned the movements, you decide to sign up for the valley karate tournament. As Daniel you will have to face all the members of the Cobra kai in the tournament and thus win the Valley tournament. In the Valley tournament mode, you can play two players in a classic match up. In the Free Tournament mode, you can play with your friends and face them to win the tournament, in this mode with up to 8 players.
